com.tomzhu.tree

Class BinaryTreeNode<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomzhu.tree.TreeNode<E>
      • com.tomzhu.tree.BinaryTreeNode<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of element

    public class BinaryTreeNode<E>
extends TreeNode<E>
    simple binary tree node implementation.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    tomzhu

      construct a binary tree node using value.

      construct a binary tree node based on value and parent node.
      BinaryTreeNode(E value, BinaryTreeNode<E> parent, BinaryTreeNode<E> leftChild, BinaryTreeNode<E> rightChild)
      construct a binary tree node using specific value, parent, left child and right child.
